messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Put your suit sensors on maximum, crew !!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vacant Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a pack of [REDACTED] have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Orc Base in Space 542 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Orc Base in Space 542's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mech Bay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Orc Base in Space 542, please stand-by.
